note:
I enjoy sketching for fun and relaxation, mainly in pen. I've also started printing recently but still really still learning.
I enjoy gaming - cards, board games and computer games. My current favourite games are Slay the spire and Inscryption.
My other vice is reading. I'll read any kind of fiction but my favourites are mainly science fiction and fantasy. I'm currently reading Beyond the Aquila Rift by Alastair Reynolds.
